statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}})-[:OWNER]->(:GCPProject{id: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:GCPMonitoringUptimeCheckConfig) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP Monitoring Uptime Check Configs that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}})-[:OWNER]->(:GCPProject{id: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}})-[r:RESOURCE]->(:GCPMonitoringUptimeCheckConfig) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP Project to GCP Monitoring Uptime Check Configs relationships that are out of date

name: cleanup GCP Monitoring Uptime Check Configs
